Package stocks.model

Interface Portfolio

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexiblePortfolioImpl, InflexiblePortfolioImpl
    public interface Portfolio
    Represents a User's Portfolio with a portfolio name, creation date and user's stocks within the portfolio.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPortfolioName

        java.lang.String getPortfolioName()
        A getter that fetches the Portfolio name.
        Returns:
        the name of the current portfolio.

      • getCreationDate

        java.lang.String getCreationDate()
        Fetches the creation date of the portfolio.
        Returns:
        provides a String which gives the portfolio creation date.

      • addStock

        void addStock​(stocks.model.Stock st)
        Adds a stock to the user's existing stock list to the current portfolio. Replaces the stock with the latest values if the stock already exists in the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        st - Stock to be added to the portfolio.

      • getStocks

        java.util.List<stocks.model.Stock> getStocks()
        Fetch the list of all stocks in the current portfolio.
        Returns:
        List of all stocks in the current portfolio.

      • constructPortfolioXml

        org.w3c.dom.Document constructPortfolioXml()
        Create an XML representation of the portfolio.
        Returns:
        XML document representation of the portfolio.

      • constructPortfolioComposition

        java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> constructPortfolioComposition()
        Get the portfolio composition as list.
        Returns:
        2D list of the portfolio composition.

      • constructPortfolioValuation

        java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> constructPortfolioValuation​(java.lang.String date,
                                                                             java.lang.String username)
                                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the valuation of the portfolio for a given date. The total value of each stock along with the total value of the portfolio is returned.
        Parameters:
        date - Date for which the valuation is calculated.
        username - Username of the portfolio owner.
        Returns:
        2D list of the portfolio valuation with each stock's current value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the price data for the ticker doesn't exist.

      • removeStock

        void removeStock​(stocks.model.Stock st)
        It is used to remove Stock objects from a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        st - The stock object to be removed from the Portfolio's stock list.

      • getPortfolioPerformance

        java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> getPortfolioPerformance​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> dates,
                                                                                                     java.lang.String username)
                                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Provides a list that has the valuation of a portfolio over a range of dates. The list size depends on the date range provided as an input. The list size is between 5 and 30(inclusive).
        Parameters:
        dates - The dates for evaluating the performance.
        username - Username of the portfolio owner.
        Returns:
        A list of tuples that stores the date and the portfolio's valuation on that date.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the dates are not given in a valid format.
